title: Sonar - Radar Watch Face
summary: Exclusive navy watch face with military-grade animations and effects.
developerAddress: Ukraine, 02081, Kiev, Darnitskij area, Anna Akhmatova street, 22, office 4009

descriptionHTML:
🚤“A smooth sea never made a skillful sailor.” - Unknown
Give your smartwatch a unique radar look with this fine-crafted navy watch face. Crispy design, four color modes and a military-grade precision of animations (up to 20 ms update rate)!

Sonar Watch Face packs customizable animations you can turn off and on, and a smart, great-looking ambient mode. Plus it has a range of color choices that makes this watch face suitable for any occasion and style.

🌟Main features:
- Choice of 4 color styles (blue, green, orange, and red);
- Hybrid analog and digital display;
- Customizable animations;
- Smart ambient mode;
- Different time formats;
- Displays date.

⌚Is it for me?
Sonar is designed for Android Wear watches and works perfectly both on round and square models.

Supports all Android Wear watches, including:
✔ ASUS ZenWatch 1;
✔ ASUS ZenWatch 2;
✔ Moto 360 Sport;
✔ Motorola 360 1st gen;
✔ Motorola 360 2nd gen;
✔ LG G Watch;
✔ LG G Watch R;
✔ LG G Watch Urbane;
✔ LG G Watch Urbane 2;
✔ Samsung Gear Live;
✔ Sony Smartwatch 3;
✔ Casio WSD-F10;
✔ Fossil Q Founder;
✔ Huawei Watch;
✔ TAG Heuer Connected.

💣Important Notice!💥
Samsung Gear, Samsung Gear S, Samsung Gear S2 are NOT YET supported. Please, for Samsung smartwatches based on Tizen follow the link: https://goo.gl/M1ABvk

🚀How to install?
This watch face will be installed automatically from your paired phone.
If it doesn't show up please go to the Android Wear App > Settings and Resync all apps.
Once installed, you can select the Sonar Watch Face from the Android Wear App or directly on your watch. Few taps and you are ready to go!

📝Want to drop us a message?
We'd love hearing from you!
Contact us via our website: http://boostwatch.style
Google+ page: https://goo.gl/CJ79u2
or e-mail: wearables@boost.solutions

And don't forget to check out our store for more fine-crafted watch faces🙊
comments: I like this very much. But... Hello, I like this watchface very much. The ambient mode works very well so well in fact that I usually dont use it but it looks cool with this watchface. However there is one minor hiccup, the "clock face" toggle doesnt seem to do anything on my moto 360 v2. It seems to not make a difference in ambient or full power mode.          Update: Dev contacted me after I reported a small issue on moto 360 this has been fixed so as promised I have upped my rating to 5 stars. Good support and good communications.
Very nice concept and attractive watch face.  Does exactly what it should do!
Never showed up in my phone to even use. Looks great in the photo. Once downloaded, it shows installed but not accessible in any way.
recentChanges: - Fixed bug with clock face display
